text: Nâ€™olwekyo (gwe omubaka) gumikiriza nga ababaka abavumu bwe bagumukiriza era tobasabira bibonerezo ku batuukako mangu, naye olunaku lwe baliraba bye balaganyisibwa baliba nga abatawangaala okugyako akaseera katono mu budde obwemisana, (ebyo byonna ebibabuuliddwa) bubaka obutuusiddwa gye muli ate olwo balizikirizibwa okugyako abantu abonoonyi
